name: Drake Hits Rock Bottom
description:
LD45: Drake Hits Rock Bottom

Theme: Start with nothing

Controls:

WSAD to move

Space to jump

J to attack

Items:

J will improve your jump

S will improve your speed

Grammys will unlock doors

Music from https://filmmusic.io/
"Danger Storm" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/)
